ygData.subject: RE: Temple of Sol Ro (was:Ro quest armor pieces)
ygData.msgSnippet: My bard is a wood elf. Yes. They were amiable.... Huh. I wonder if they look at Deity? I chose Solusek Ro as my deity because my main server is Sol Ro. Sarah
ygData.messageBody:
My bard is a wood elf.
Yes. They were amiable.... Huh.

I wonder if they look at Deity? I chose Solusek Ro as my deity because my
main server is Sol Ro.

Sarah Heacock
sarah@...
Meara, level 13 ERudian Enchanter, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 12 Songweaver of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance,Test
Feyre, level 6 Dark Elf Wizard of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance, Test

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Jeff Portwine [mailto:jdport@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 1:56 PM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Temple of Sol Ro (was:Ro quest armor pieces)
>
>
>From: "Jeff Portwine" <jdport@...>
>
>Really? Those things were amiable to you?
>What race are you? I am a high elf cleric and the elementals are
>definately not amiable to me =)
>The first time I went there the goblins were green to me so i'm
>not sure that they were hostile, but
>I THINK they were. The Elementals and Fire Imps though have
>definately been very unhappy with my existance since the first day
>I met them =)
>
>Speaking of lavastorm.. if you've never been there it's a good
>place to get bloodstones. Bloodstones aren't all that expensive
>to buy... only about 5g each, but most everything in lavastorm
>drops them so if you are in the area killing some time you can
>pick some up that way. I'd say you get one every 3-5 kills if
>not more often...
>
>-Eachann Bronzeleaf,
>-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Perhaps a Princess... <sarah@...>
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 4:50 PM
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Temple of Sol Ro (was:Ro quest armor pieces)
>
>
>> From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>>
>> Actually. Um.
>>
>> Fire elementals were amiable to me. So were the goblins.
>>
>> They were NOT ready to attack.
>>
>> I thought that was strange even at the time.
>> Sarah Heacock sarah@...
>> Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
>> Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
>> Faesong, level 12 Songweaver of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance,Test
>> Feyre, level 6 Dark Elf Wizard of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance, Test
>>
>>
>> >-----Original Message-----
>> >From: Jeff Portwine [mailto:jdport@...]
>> >Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 1:27 PM
>> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Temple of Sol Ro (was:Ro quest armor pieces)
>> >
>> >
>> >From: "Jeff Portwine" <jdport@...>
>> >
>> >As long as you can avoid the fire elemnentals and the fire imps
>> >and the goblins, you will be fine. Everything else there is
>> >Non-agro... Fire elementals, Imps, and goblins will attack you though.
>> >The goblins are probably level 10-12 and the Imps and Elementals
>> >are around level 14-16
>> >(these are approx levels.. i don't know exactly) and those 3
>> >things will attack just about anyone
>> >who is not fairly high in level.
>> >
>> >-Eachann Bronzeleaf
>> >-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr
>> >
>> >----- Original Message -----
>> >From: Perhaps a Princess... <sarah@...>
>> >To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>

>> >Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Temple of Sol Ro (was:Ro quest armor pieces)
>> >
>> >
>> >> From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>> >>
>> >> I have only RARELY been attacked running through lavastorm --
>> >even without
>> >> any form of invisibility.
>> >> My level 10 bard went to the Temple to turn a Lambent stone in for the
>> >> Darkwood staves. No invisibility.
>> >> And she turned off speed song to avoid running into lava. No problems
>> >> whatsoever.
>> >>
>> >> Sarah HEacock
>> >>
>> >> >-----Original Message-----
>> >> >From: Paul Heenan [mailto:pheenan@...]
>> >> >Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 1:31 PM
>> >> >To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
>> >> >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Temple of Sol Ro (was:Ro quest armor pieces)
>> >> >
>> >> >
>> >> >From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>> >> >
>> >> >The Temple of Solusek Ro is in Lavastorm across from the SolA
>> >entrance. You
>> >> >can go there at lvl 1 (well, if you can run through LS without being
>> >> >attacked) because they are indifferent to everybody (unless
>you hail the
>> >> >Genie, doh!). Also, our armor is NOT the Armor of Ro as the
>> >> >subject implies.
>> >> >That is the Paladin armor.
>> >> >
>> >> >Drizben D'Vorn
>> >> >Defiled High Priest of Innoruuk
>> >> >Oblivion Knight of the 30th Circle
>> >> >

>place is? i
>> >> >> haven't

>> >And what lvl
>> >> >> should you be before you poke your nose in the place?
>> >> >>
